creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: small cluster of trees and rocks at LR with low, thatched roof pavilion in back; low mountains rising across the fan in background; inscription across top right with two square intaglio stamps just to the L of inscription; unmounted
markings: UC/URC top stamp, square intaglio: [Ai?]; UC/URC, bottom stamp, square intaglio: [Zan]
title: Landscape after Wu Chen
